# animatesToDestination

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the dragging formation animates while the drag is over the destination.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var animatesToDestination: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

During the conclusion of an accepted drag, if this property is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the drag manager will animate each dragging image to their [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingFormation/none] locations. Otherwise, the drag images are removed without any animation.

This property is inspected between prepareForDragOperation: and performDragOperation:. You should enumerate through the dragging items during performDragOperation: to set the item’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingItem/draggingFrame] to the correct destinations.

## Sliding the image

- **slideDraggedImage(to:)**: Slides the image to a specified location.
- **draggingFormation**: The formation of the dragging items while the drag is over the destination.
